snippet: OREMLAND--Martha H.,passed away on May 12 in her 101st year. A woman of high fashion and intellect. Held lovingly by sons, Randall Weingarten (Elizabeth) and Jon Weingarten (Susan), grandchildren Hilary, Kai, Jason and Leigh-Ann, and great- grandchildren, Erin, Amy, and Xuan. She touched the lives of all who knew her. 1/3
lead_paragraph: OREMLAND--Martha H.,passed away on May 12 in her 101st year. A woman of high fashion and intellect. Held lovingly by sons, Randall Weingarten (Elizabeth) and Jon Weingarten (Susan), grandchildren Hilary, Kai, Jason and Leigh-Ann, and great- grandchildren, Erin, Amy, and Xuan. She touched the lives of all who knew her. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OREMLAND, MARTHA H.
